name: just-a-kanban
description: App that helps to manage activities
author: Alexander Holuenko

scripts.prebuild: concurrently "cd app && npm i" "cd server && npm i"
scripts.build: rm -rf ./build && copyfiles -f server/media/* build/media && copyfiles -f server/package.json build && cd app && npm run build-client && cd ../server && npm run build-server && copyfiles -f .env ../build/server && copyfiles -f ../app/.env ../build/client && cd ../build && npm i
